message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a new method for representation learning using graph convolutional networks (GCN) for semi-supervised node classification tasks. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The method involves a new convolution operation on regular size feature maps, which could also be relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) and neural networks (cs.NE). Additionally, the paper introduces a new approach to GCN architecture, which could be of interest to researchers in the field of systems and control (cs.SI).
